metadata.title: CVE-2020-17354 on Ubuntu 18.04 LTS (bionic) - medium
metadata.description: LilyPond before 2.24 allows attackers to bypass the -dsafe protectionmechanism via output-def-lookup or output-def-scope, as demonstrated bydangerous Scheme code in a .ly file that causes arbitrary code executionduring conversion to a different file format. NOTE: in 2.24 and laterversions, safe mode is removed, and the product no longer tries to blockcode execution when external files are used.

criterions.comment: lilypond package in bionic is affected and may need fixing.
